code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const YourBotArmy=_ref=>{let{removeBotFromArmy}=_ref;const[enlistedBots,setEnlistedBots]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://bot-api-ga2w.onrender.com/enlisted').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setEnlistedBots(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching enlisted bots:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Bot Army"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"enlisted-bot",children:enlistedBots.map(bot=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"enlisted-bot",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:bot.avatar_url,alt:bot.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:bot.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Class: ",bot.bot_class]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Health: ",bot.health]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Damage: ",bot.damage]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Armor: ",bot.armor]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeBotFromArmy(bot.id),children:"Remove from Army"})]},bot.id))})]});};export default YourBotArmy;
